ca.weblite.pisces

Interface Font.FontProvider

  • Enclosing class:
    Font

    public static interface Font.FontProvider
    Interface that can be implemented by any class that wishes to provide fonts to Pisces.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Font getFont(java.lang.String name, float size)
      Returns the specified font in the given size.

    • Method Detail

      • getFont

        Font getFont(java.lang.String name,
           float size)
        Returns the specified font in the given size.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the font.
        size - The size of the font (in pixels);
        Returns:
